original_text: When Hezekiah had been king for four years, Shalmaneser, the king of Assyria, took his army to attack Samaria. That was when Hoshea had been king of Israel for seven years. The Assyrian army made their camp around the city of Samaria.
korean_text: 히스기야 왕 제사년 곧 이스라엘의 왕 엘라의 아들 호세아 제칠년에 앗수르의 왕 살만에셀이 사마리아로 올라와서 에워쌌더라

sentences.original_text: When Hezekiah had been king for four years
sentences.korean_translation: 히스기야가 왕이 된 지 4년이 되었을 때

sentences.original_text: Shalmaneser, the king of Assyria, took his army to attack Samaria
sentences.korean_translation: 앗수르의 왕 살마네셀이 군대를 이끌고 사마리아를 공격하려고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: That was when Hoshea had been king of Israel for seven years
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 호세아가 이스라엘의 왕이 된 지 7년이 되었을 때였습니다

sentences.original_text: The Assyrian army made their camp around the city of Samaria
sentences.korean_translation: 앗수르 군대가 사마리아 성 주변에 진지를 구축했습니다
